customFields.Priority P1 to P4: P4 - Low-Impact (Edge or unsuitable to repeat?)

inline.description:
1. In the "Invite Guest" field enter following types of users:
    1. an email that's not already in the system
    2. a user who is already in the team
    3. a user who is not part of the team
  2. Click "Invite Guest" and check that users (a) and (c) will be invited and for user (b) an error is shown.

Note that there is an option to Invite More. Click on the Invite More button
inline.expectedResult: • User should be taken to the first screen of invitation, i.e. it should display the option to Invite Guest and Invite Member.

customFields.Related ticket(s): (Story) Add "Invite More People" button on the confirmation screen for Invite Members â€” MM-21558
